text: Welcome to the MineSafe AI Dashboard! This quick tour will walk you through the key features.
This is the main header. It provides a quick overview of the system's status and navigation controls.
Click here to simulate a high-alert situation in the mine.
Use this button to switch between the 3D mine view and the incident report table.
Watch a video tutorial on how to use the dashboard.
Access external resources and documentation about mining safety.
Here you can see the live camera feed from the mining site.
This table displays real-time reports and alerts from the AI.
Use this chatbot to interact with the AI and ask questions.
